payload.name: feedback-loops-oscillate-under-delayed-noisy-observation
payload.title: Feedback loops oscillate under delayed/noisy observation
payload.formal: delayed feedback can destabilize proportional controllers; filtering and hysteresis are standard mitigations.
payload.apm2_mapping: telemetry is a control input. If you react to noisy error rates with immediate throttling/spawning, you will oscillate. APM2 should treat telemetry ingestion and aggregation as part of the stability story: risk-aware sampling (66), smoothing, hysteresis, and “hold-down timers” for policy changes.
